name: ENVPrefix
author: Serge
description: A demo CBRAIN task that adds SINGULARITYENV_ prefix to config environment variable names
command-line: touch old_{$MYVARIABLE}; touch new_{$SINGULARITYENV_MYVARIABLE} ; du -a -H -h [CBRAIN_INPUT] > out

inputs.name: Input file or directory
inputs.description: Any file or directory in CBRAIN

output-files.name: old file
output-files.description: The output of the 'du' command in human units

output-files.name: new file
output-files.description: The output of the 'du' command in human units
